mapper.select: SELECT a.rsv_seq, a.cop_seq, a.cop_name, a.rsc_seq, b.rsc_name, a.rsv_detail, a.car_name, a.rsv_id, a.rsv_name, a.car_explain, a.rsv_start, a.rsv_end FROM (SELECT rc.rsv_seq, rc.cop_seq, cp.cop_name, rc.rsc_seq, rc.rsv_detail, rc.rsv_id, rc.rsv_name, rc.car_name, rc.car_explain ,rc.rsv_start, rc.rsv_end FROM (SELECT r.rsv_seq, r.cop_seq, r.rsc_seq, r.rsv_detail, r.rsv_id, r.rsv_name, r.rsv_start, r.rsv_end, c.car_name, c.car_explain FROM (SELECT * FROM tb_reservations WHERE rsv_state = true) as r INNER JOIN tb_cars as c ON r.rsv_detail = c.car_seq WHERE r.cop_seq = #{copSeq}) as rc INNER JOIN (SELECT cop_name, cop_seq FROM tb_companys) as cp ON rc.cop_seq = cp.cop_seq) as a INNER JOIN (SELECT rsc_seq, rsc_name FROM tb_resources) as b ON a.rsc_seq = b.rsc_seq;
